name: Michele Query
text: I wasn't at Pizza Hut, I was next door at Bamboo Garden eating Chinese dinner with my husband.  I had Shrimp with cashews and shrimp fried rice and a shrimp egg roll.  it was all wonderful, and enough that I was able to eat the rest the â€¦More

text: My husband and I and a couple of my friends stopped by to eat at Pizza Hut and I was really disappointed the waitress was rude and mixing up our orders and she didnâ€™t have a friendly face and the pâ€™zones were burnt and when we went to go â€¦More

text: Cool people.   Good piazza

name: Country Boi Black843
text: l luv it so much i don't get why people talk bad about the store they are so nice an helpful.  The food from pizza hut is good

name: Phil Warren
text: I ordered online and ordered the wrong crust and they were happy to remake it. Very friendly  customer service and your pizza will be HOT upon pickup.

name: Billy Cole
text: Clean building, friendly staff, and easy to find. Everything was made as requested with no mistakes.

name: Scot Epling
text: Carryout pizza was ready on time and tasted good. Email coupon made it even better.

name: Anita Wurm
text: Fraud was reported at this location. Debit card was run through 2x and declined,  not possible.  Different card used went through. Paid $68 for pizza. Spoke to mgr, who denied allegation and screamed at me, refused to give me her name. Reported to corp.

name: GodlyTsunami
text: AWESOME FOOD! The workers were patient with all customers and spoke politely. The pizza and wings we got were perfectly done not overdone nor under cooked. They handled the dinner rush with finesse i recommend for all my fellow young adults â€¦More

name: hector Ochoa
text: Worst place to order from bad service and food is worste

name: Lolo Steel
text: Love pizza hut from pizza to side items or wings or the dessert  everyone works hard so i give them respect

name: ronnie richardson
text: I love the hand-toss crust on their pizza

name: Alison Morter
text: Ricardo was really nice and friendly and our pizza was perfect. Seriously one of the best pizzas Iâ€™ve ever had from Pizza Hut.

name: Courtney Martin
text: Tried ordering online and estimated time was 45-50 which is pretty normal. Ended up waiting almost 2 hours without being able to get ahold of anyone at the store. Completely unprofessional and lack of communication. I will not be using Pizza Hut.

name: Mrs. AAP
text: It's ok but not like back in the day..I used to love pizza hut but now it's just ok.the best place for pizza is pappa John's and it's still not the best .the do make really good season bread sticks and their thincrust pepperoni pizza is still a favorite. I guess twice a year is ok for me

name: Gary Tucker
text: Good pizza for the price, friendly service

name: Capt Matt & Ashley Balassone
text: the pizza was great! The employees were very kind and understandable. Probably one of the best Pizza Hut's i've been to.

name: Bill Yaeger
text: The last three times I have ordered from this place, it has taken way too long for the delivery to be made. This time, when I called, I was told they were "short-staffed" and that the order was on its way. 30 minutes later, the order still â€¦More

name: edward levon
text:
Welcome to the wonderful world of cardboard, crayon red and plastics.

text: By far the most pitiful Pizzahut.....no.  The most pitiful establishment I have ever come across.  The owner of this franchise should be ashamed.  Hell, after this transaction I drove to the restaurant itself to correct the issue.  The â€¦More

name: Wes Myers
text: First, the food was delivered 15 minutes past the promised window and was cold. We assumed they delivered several others on the same trip and we were just the last on the list. â€¦More

name: Dan Jackson jr
text: The wings are savory and delicious

name: Jackie Husted
text: Called ahead to order on way home. Went to pick up and order was not placed. Waited 30 minutes for the worst pizza we ever had. The bacon was uncooked ..it was terrible.

name: tony scruggs
text: The staff and food are amazing! Great customer service!

name: Al Haggard
text: Ordered my pizza two hours before delivery charge time, from a store 1.3 miles away .It showed up hard and cold.  Never again, Pizza Gut

name: Ebony Nesbitt
text: The quality of pizza sold at Pizza Hut is not on par with other chains. This location did have nice customer service.

name: Lee Anne B
text: Breadsticks & pizza were both over cooked

name: Kim Elmore
text: This was the worst experience I have ever had with delivery. We moved all day and placed an order that said allow an hour for delivery. Well we did and it was delivered hard as a rock and cold. Called to report it and stayed on hold for 4 â€¦More

name: Janet Kennedy
text: Drivers are always promo and very friendly! Nice store with great food - I highly recommend !
